dialogue.text: Guide told me this group has something special...
What a suprise!
The singer without a voice.
I am not in the business of giving out free rides you know.
*I've got this... Stay calm. Breathe.*
So, tell me. What makes you think you're ready to take the stage and win tonight?
options: We've been through so much as a band

dialogue.id: We've been through so much as a band
dialogue.text: We've faced setbacks, had doubts, and moments that nearly broke us. But we won't quit.
What are you a self-help group that plays music?
I'm am a huge fan of your old band Spaghetti Dumpster.
Old? Choose your next words wisely, fanboy.
Still speechless, I see. If you want the big stage, you better learn to speak up.
This industry is not always kind.
You can have all the heart in the world and still get no where.
So, what is it that sets your band apart?
Why should I care about you more than any other group that plays tonight?
*He is so intimidating, he can see right through me...*
*No, I am capable of doing this!*
I said...
Why should I care about you more than any other group that plays tonight?
Because no matter what happens, we won't give up.
We've pushed each other, supported each other, and we're not afraid of failing.
Persistence, huh? We'll see if that persistence pays off.

dialogue.id: Our guitarist shreds better than anyone.
dialogue.text: Our guitarist is the best there is. She can shred like no one else.
A flashy guitarist is good, but music is about more than one person...
You've got to do better than that. Come on, show me something real.
Alright then. You've talked the talk.
Now it's time to see if you can walk the walk.
Get ready to take the stage.
